dcterms:creator: Brenden M. Lake
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Jason Gross
Joshua B. Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten characters from 50 different alphabets, containing 20 examples per character. It is commonly used for few-shot learning tasks, particularly in image classification.
dcterms:title: Omniglot Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sachin Ravi
Hugo Larochelle
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from ImageNet, structured for few-shot learning tasks. It contains 64 training classes, 12 validation classes, and 24 test classes, each with 600 images. It is used for evaluating few-shot learning algorithms in image classification.
dcterms:title: MiniImagenet
